name: Royal Guard
effects: 30% chance to intercept attacks on a female ally, reducing all damage by 50%

desc_short: Chance of taking physical damage for a female unit in defense mode
一定機率以「防禦」狀態代替我方女性兵員承受物理攻擊
일정 확률로 여성 유닛이 받는 물리공격을 '방어'상태로 대신 받음
Chance de prendre les dégâts d'une unité femme en garde
Chance, dass die Einheit für einen weiblichen Verbündeten im ABW-Modus Schaden nimmt.
Posibilidad de recibir daño físico por una unidad femenina en modo defensivo
desc_long: Adds chance of taking physical damage for a female unit in defense mode.
